OpenPivGui Documentation

OpenPivGui is a graphical user interface, providing an efficient workflow for evaluating and postprocessing particle image velocimetry (PIV) images. OpenPivGui relies on the Python libraries provided by the OpenPIV project [http://www.openpiv.net/].
